SELECT cm.student_no studentNo ,s.student_name studentName ,cm.club_no clubNo ,c.club_name clubName ,cm.create_date createDate
FROM club_member cm INNER JOIN club c ON cm.club_no = c.club_no
INNER JOIN student s ON cm.student_no = s.student_no
WHERE s.student_no = #{studentNo};

SELECT cm.student_no studentNo ,s.student_name studentName ,cm.club_no clubNo ,c.club_name clubName ,cm.create_date createDate
FROM club_member cm INNER JOIN club c ON cm.club_no = c.club_no
INNER JOIN student s ON cm.student_no = s.student_no
INNER JOIN professor p ON c.professor_no = p.professor_no
WHERE p.professor_no = #{professorNo};

SELECT c.club_no clubNo ,c.club_name clubName ,c.club_content clubContent ,c.club_room clubRoom ,c.professor_no professorNo ,p.professor_name professorName
FROM club c
LEFT JOIN professor p ON c.professor_no = p.professor_no
WHERE c.club_no = #{clubNo}

SELECT c.club_no clubNo , c.club_name clubName , c.club_content clubContent , c.club_Room clubRoom , c.professor_no professorNo , p.professor_name professorName , ci.filename fileName , c.create_date createDate , c.update_date updateDate
FROM club c
LEFT JOIN professor p ON c.professor_no = p.professor_no
LEFT JOIN club_img ci ON c.club_no = ci.club_no
ORDER BY c.club_no desc
